Please click to select a bank
\n\nGo to complete the tasks and get more cash rewards!

Your withdrawal application has been received, and the finance is under review. The review time is within 24 hours to 48 hours. You can receive your withdrawal as soon as possible on the same day. If you do not receive it on the same day, please do not rush it.

Please be patient, this is often because there are too many people who initiate withdrawals, it takes time to process, or the payment channel is congested.

If the withdrawal fails, please contact customer service for consultation.

Congratulations, your withdrawal has arrived!

You can share it with your friends. Please share a screenshot of your successful withdrawal in the NoiseMedia telegram group

Invite more people to join NoiseMedia and have a chance to get rich rewards.

The mobile phone number is inconsistent with the bank card binding, please fill in the correct bank card account number and bound mobile phone number.\n\nThe amount has been refunded to your platform account balance, you can view the refund record in the income and expenditure records.

The bank account is not supported. Please change to a new bank account. Then reapply for withdrawal.\n\nThe amount will be refunded to your plaThe amount has been refunded to your platform account balance, you can view the refund record in the income and expenditure records.

You do not meet the withdrawal rules, please check the detailed withdrawal rules. If the rules are met, the withdrawal is successful.\n\nThe amount has been refunded to your platform account balance, you can view the refund record in the income and expenditure records.
Your account balance is insufficient, please recharge.

VIP %1$s upgrade fee is Rs %2$s (Which will be debited directly from account balance)
At the same time, cash pledge is Cash pledge: %3$s SAR (In order to receive tasks, your balance needs to remain above %4$s SAR as a cash pledge)

Therefore, before upgrading, please make sure that your balance is sufficient. After the upgrade is successful, you cannot downgrade.

What does the Cash pledge mean?
If you upgrade to VIP1 or higher, it means that you have decided to cooperate with NoiseMedia, and you must deposit enough margin in the balance to maintain the cooperation with NoiseMedia.
Therefore, the required balance is stored in your account as balance Balance Required. After you pay enough deposit according to the current VIP Balance Required, the member can immediately perform tasks according to their VIP level. Members can withdraw all balances at any time (including all the income you earn and the deposit you deposit).
Some members have been upgraded to VIP by mistake and do not intend to deposit a full balance as a deposit. It is recommended that members invite more friends to earn referral bonuses until you earn enough income as a deposit. We would like to remind all members not to upgrade that if you are not prepared to deposit your money into the balance as a deposit, the membership fee will not be returned to your balance because the VIP level cannot be downgraded to a lower level.

which will be deducted from your balance.

 Please make sure your account balance is sufficient.
Will be approved within 1 working day! \n\nYou can check the withdrawal status in the withdrawal record.
Does not match your current level.\n\nPlease go to the current level to receive the task

Please enter the USDT collection address
2. The withdrawal time is from Monday to Sunday from 10 am to 10 pm.

3. After you submit the withdrawal application, your funds will arrive in your account within 24 hours. If you have not received the payment within the time limit, please contact customer service for assistance in time.
Please enter a pure 6-digit number as the withdrawal password.
Congratulations on your successful upgrade!\n\nYour current level is VIP

Starcom is a global media and communications agency that was founded in Chicago. The company provides a wide range of advertising and marketing services to clients, including media planning and buying, digital strategy, data and analytics, and content creation.

Starcom is the Human Experience Company. A world-renowned media communications agency, we harness the power of media, technology and data to create experiences people love and actions brands need. With more than 7,000 employees worldwide, Starcom partners with the world\'s leading marketers and new establishment brands, including Bank of America, Best Buy, Coca-Cola, Kellogg Company, KraftHeinz, Novartis, P/G, Samsung, Visa and more. Starcom is part of Publicis Media within Publicis Groupe [Euronext Paris FR0000130577, CAC40], one of the world’s leading communications groups.
We work with some of the world\'s most loved brands and leading startups to help them grow globally.
We combine data, technology and full funnel strategies to drive positive ROAS for our clients.

Our team of content creators, marketers, strategists and social gurus have developed some of the largest and most engaged communities on Instagram and Facebook and now we\'re helping brands make social media an essential channel for their company or their cause.
NoiseMedia is an intelligent money-making system developed in the UK. After a year of research and development and 4 months of internal testing, it was finally launched.

This product is dedicated to solving the problem of online marketers in terms of visitor growth on social networks. Accurate matching through intelligent systems can increase the number of users and exposure of related products, thereby increasing the popularity of related products. Finally, complete the sales increase goal. (Welcome online merchants and trading companies to cooperate with NoiseMedia)

At the same time, NoiseMedia can provide freelancers with long-term beneficial work, providing more job opportunities throughout the intelligent system. In our timed task system, when you complete the corresponding task, you will receive the merchant\'s commission.
The industrial logic of NoiseMedia comes from the following aspects;
1. The operation of the intelligent NoiseMedia system is only used to match orders and users, and the product itself does not participate in any promotions or commission settlements.

2. Traders should ensure that the tasks published by the platform are true and effective, and strictly abide by local laws and regulations. Including, but not limited to, no racial discrimination, no economic fraud, over 18, no political discrimination, no personal attack and other related inappropriate speech or behavior. The platform will carefully check the tasks and will not be held responsible for the results of the violations.

3. NoiseMedia\'s revenue comes from the merchant\'s task commission and the user\'s VIP purchase fee. If there are other tax-related issues, the tax department will investigate separately and announce the results of the investigation.

4. Members of the platform must perform the tasks displayed by the commission provider honestly and must not cheat or obtain illegal commissions by cheating. Once discovered, the consequences will be at your own risk.

5. This product is a centralized service platform, which may be closed due to force majeure factors such as pirate attacks, earthquakes, tsunamis, conventional or unconventional military operations at the location from the server. Downtime caused by any behavior does not represent the voluntary behavior of the platform, and the platform will resume normal services as soon as possible.
6. NoiseMedia has the right to update and modify the product. At the same time, NoiseMedia must notify all users 24 hours in advance of updates and revisions to laws and regulations.

Welcome to NoiseMedia. You can start your earning journey here.

Dear everyone,

1 Register on NoiseMedia platform and get Rs 5.

2 Regular employees can earn daily income by completing the media tasks of the platform.

3 The income of the team will be unlimited, the team will be what you should pay attention to.

4 NoiseMedia also offers fixed deposits of various tenors.

5 Withdraw funds in seconds on our NoiseMedia platform.

6 All agents who want to make more money can invite your subordinates to upgrade their membership.

You can form your own team and let the team make more money for you! 

You can get level 1 commission rewards for team upgrades and level 3 commission rewards for team tasks. 

The more teams, the more you earn! !
If you want to make more money every day, you can upgrade your level.
Invite your team to upgrade, you can get 1 levels of commission rewards for team upgrades! \n\nAs long as your team is upgraded, you can make money every day!

You can invite friends to get invitation rewards, or you can invite friends to form a team.

The team can make money for you every day!

The more teams you have, the higher your team income!
Do you want to recharge?\n\nTouch \'Yes\' to next step
1.NoiseMedia is a global media part-time task system. For the convenience of our global staff, we use the very secure channel cryptocurrency USDT trc20 and local payment systems for settlement.

2. The recharge system is an automatic system. Each customer will be assigned an exclusive recharge address. (You need to obtain a new address for each recharge). The time limit is half an hour. Please copy the address here to transfer within the valid time. After completing the transfer, you will receive your balance in about 5 minutes. If you do not receive it within the time limit, please contact customer service for assistance.

3. NoiseMedia will not ask for any private recharge, and no official staff will send you a private message to request transfer. Please pay attention to distinguish the true and false to protect the safety of your property.
Funds have been withdrawn to your account balance
Less than the minimum deposit amount
Insufficient balance, please recharge your account first
After expiration, you will be able to earn %1$s!
You need to recharge to your account balance first, and then make a deposit. After the deposit expires, you can immediately withdraw the total income.
The minimum recharge amount is Rs 20
NoiseMedia requires that the recharge amount must be a multiple of 5, please enter the correct recharge amount.
After the transfer is successful, please contact the Recharge Service and send a screenshot of your transfer, which can speed up the confirmation process

1: The deposit address is valid for 30 minutes. Please complete the transfer within 30 minutes after obtaining the address. If it exceeds 30 minutes, please do not transfer to the expired address to avoid trouble.\n2: The recharge will be reflected in your account balance within 1\-5 minutes after you complete the transfer. If the recharge has not been received for a long time, please contact the online customer service for assistance.
2. Open a cryptocurrency wallet or exchange
Please continue to complete the payment
The current level is not yet open, it will be open soon, so stay tuned!

Congratulations, you have become a super VIP user and received a free %1$s from NoiseMedia. You read that right, it's free!
You can choose to accept or reject, and you cannot revoke this decision after choosing to accept or reject. Please cherish this lucky opportunity.
If you choose to accept, then the system will upgrade you for free. After the upgrade, the [Cash pledge] needs to be handled by the user. The NoiseMedia gift is a VIP level, excluding the balance.

Please choose to confirm the upgrade or reject the upgrade.

Your Cash pledge(guarantee fund) is not enough!
The balnce must begreater than %1$s. Please recharge! Only when your balance is greater than %2$s can you receive the task of the current level. 

What does Cash pledge mean? 
If you upgrade to VIP1 or higher, it means that you have decided to cooperate with NoiseMedia and become a full-time employee, and you must deposit sufficient margin in the balance to maintain the cooperation with NoiseMedia. Of course, this part of the cash pledge can be withdrawn at any time,
so the cash pledge is only kept in your account balance. After you pay enough deposit according to the current VIP level, members can immediately perform tasks according to their VIP level. Members can withdraw all balances (including all earnings you earn and deposits you make) at any time. When your balance is lower than the cash pledge, you will not be able to receive tasks temporarily
Some members were upgraded to VIP by mistake, and they do not plan to use the balance as a deposit. Members are advised to invite more friends to earn referral bonus until you earn enough income as cash pledge. If you are not prepared to put your money into your balance as a deposit, then please upgrade with caution as the membership fee will not be refunded to your balance as VIP tiers cannot be downgraded to lower tiers.
Number of tasks per day:%1$s\n\nDaily task income:Rs %2$s.
First-level subordinates complete the task and contribute 3% of the task commission to the team leader.
The second-level subordinates complete the task and contribute 2% of the task commission to the team leader.
The third-level subordinates complete the task and contribute 1% of the task commission to the team leader.
Note: VIP0 employees cannot get task commissions.
First-level subordinate employees purchase VIP work qualifications, and reward the team leader with 8% of the actual purchase amount.
Second-level subordinate employees purchase VIP work qualifications, and reward the team leader with 4% of the actual purchase amount.
Third-level subordinate employees purchase VIP work qualifications, and reward the team leader with 2% of the actual purchase amount.
Get Rs 0.5 referral bonus for every friend you invite to sign up through the invite link. This reward is limited to 20 invites.
But you can still get all the upgrade rebates and quest rebates for all the users you invite.
You need to know that the users you invite must meet two conditions:
1: Register and log in to the Noise Media APP.
2: Complete the tasks on the app.
A valid invitation is not recognized until the user completes the task.
Please bind the USDT collection address
1. NoiseMedia is a global task scheduling system. For the convenience of global employees, we use the unified cryptocurrency USDT trc20 for settlement.
2. Please bind the USDT trc20 address, other addresses will not be able to bind

3. NoiseMedia is a decentralized platform. Each employee account can only be bound to one address and does not support modification. If you bind someone else\'s address by mistake, NoiseMedia cannot modify it.
Please enter your current USDT Address
Please enter your new USDT Address
USDT Address are inconsistent, please re-enter
If the credit score is below 60, the task cannot be accepted
1. Credit score is dealer management team plan, NoiseMedia does not participate in credit score adjustment
2. If the credit score is less than 60 points, you will not be able to accept the task
3. For credit rating issues, please contact the team leader (dealership) directly
1: The user must complete the task process completely and realistically (i.e. you do not enter the page where the task must be completed and click the Like button) to ban to skip or cheat

2: Users should be responsible for the team they invite and keep the whole team active (because if the person you invite does not actually complete the task, it will cause losses for the advertiser). Therefore, we recommend users to have their own After that, create a WhatsApp group of your team and invite NoiseMedia official customer service to enter the group, so that we can better help you activate your team.
3: The system detects an account with the same IP address on the same device.
1: Once the credit score has been lowered by the system, there will be a 15-day evaluation period, during which the system will stop issuing tasks.
2: You can speed up the credit rating restoration process by inviting new users, and the system will restore your task authority immediately after monitoring team activity.

3: The credit score of each level is independent. If you cannot receive the VIP1 task after the credit score was judged to be reduced during the VIP1 period, after upgrading the VIP2, the credit score will be reset to 60 points, and you can receive the VIP2 immediately. If you follow the above rules on the new level, the credit score will not be affected.
I successfully received Rs 1000. You can get it for free when you register. A part-time software that can run on your cell phone. Join my team and earn money happily.
Note:When your subordinates are upgraded to VIP2 or above, you can get the upgrade reward. There is no reward for upgrading to VIP1.

Successfully invite 1 friend, and you will get 1 raffle.

1.The rewards drawn will be directly deposited into your balance.
2.The invited user will be considered as having completed the invitation only after completing the task once.
The number of available times is 0, please invite friends to join to get the number of lucky draws.
Please enter the USDT collection address

Do you want to realize your dream?
Do you want to get rich but can\'t find a suitable platform?\n

If it is not completed 2 times in a row, it cannot be redeemed within 7 days.

1. Please make sure you have enough USDT to trade. 

2. If you fail to trade more than 2 times in a row, the account will be banned from trading for 7 days.

3. The recharge address is valid for 30 minutes, please obtain the address Complete the transfer within 30 minutes. If it exceeds 30 minutes, please do not transfer to the expired address to avoid trouble.

4. The recharge will be completed within 1\-5 minutes after you complete the transfer. If you do not receive the money for a long time , please contact online customer service for help.
1. Please make sure you have enough USDT to trade.
2. If the transaction fails more than 2 times in a row, the account will be banned from trading for 7 days.

3. The recharge address is valid for 30 minutes. Please complete the transfer within 30 minutes after obtaining the address. If it exceeds 30 minutes, please do not transfer to the expired address to avoid trouble.
4. The recharge will be completed within 1\-5 minutes after you complete the transfer. If you have not received the money for a long time, please contact the online customer service for help.
